nodes.text: Reyniu was a terrestrial planet located in the Mayagil sector between the Omwat and Kabal systems.

Eight major continents covered the planet, separated by thin bands of open ocean. Canyon systems connected various chains of in-land sea that dotted the continents. It hosted moderately developed alien life and vegetation. The atmosphere was breathable for a period not exceeding fifteen minutes at a time, after which a breathing mask would be required.

Prior to the Clone Wars, wealthy tourists would visit from the Eriadu system and the Seswenna sector. However, after Reyniu became a part of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, it was cut off from Eriadu, all but killing its tourism trade.
